_source.short_desc: The world's first and fastest Ai-powered website builder and online store solution.
_source.long_desc:
The future of website creation and design is here! Bookmark is an Ai-powered website builder which empowers people without any technical skills with the ability to instantly create an exceptional website or online store.

Bookmark's Ai software AiDA (your artificial intelligence design assistant) creates the first version of their website in under two minutes by making selections from millions of combinations specific to each user's website needs.
_source.pricing_details:
Connect Domain Plan - $4.99 /month

Professional Plan - $11.99 /month

Business Plan - $24.95 /month
_source.target_audience: Bookmark is the perfect platform for people who don't have any web design or coding experience. Our simple Ai makes creating a professional website fast, easy and fun.

category_features.name: Auto Update
category_features.definition: Automatic update of information / software

category_features.definition: Import or export content

category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.definition: Create an online form to capture new lead information

category_features.definition: Add tools to web pages to handle online bookings

category_features.definition: Includes functionalities for creating custom eCommerce websites

category_features.definition: Pre-designed layouts and themes

category_features.name: Real Time Editing
category_features.definition: Preview and make real-time changes in the web content

category_features.name: SEO Management
category_features.definition: Facilitate search engine optimization associated to content

category_features.name: Survey Builder
category_features.definition: Create and manage surveys

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.definition: Protect digital privacy and secure data

category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Kitting
category_features.definition: Group and package individual but related items as one package set

category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Marketing
category_features.definition: Coordinate marketing efforts across channels (email, landing pages, social media, etc.)

category_features.name: Multi-Store
category_features.definition: Manage multiple teams and operations from a central location

category_features.name: Promotions Management
category_features.definition: Design, communicate, and distribute incentives to perform a specific action

category_features.name: Returns Management
category_features.definition: Track and facilitate refunds/returns of products sold

category_features.name: Reviews Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor reviews of products or services

category_features.definition: Facilitate search engine optimization associated to content

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: We deliver the tools to simplify and amplify digital marketing and drive results for your business.
related_products.features: Constant Contact delivers for small businesses and nonprofits with powerful tools that simplify and amplify digital marketing. Whether it's driving sales, growing a customer base or engaging an audience, we deliver the performance and guidance to build strong connections and generate powerful results. For more information, visit www.constantcontact.com.

related_products.short_desc: Just pick a template, then customize fonts, colors, and content to match your style.
related_products.features: GoDaddy Website Builder is an online editing and publishing tool that helps you create a website, regardless of your technical skill level. Just create an account, pick a design and use the built-in editor to add your own images and text. You can make your website as simple or complex as you'd like. You can even add a full online store complete with product listings, coupons, shopping cart, shipping and multiple payment options.

related_products.short_desc: Start building your website Create a Free Account.
related_products.features: Websites 360?, It's Just Better - Build your own site today with our powerful website builder. We power over 20K companies. Our website platform was designed by experienced marketers with the sole purpose of driving sales at the highest possible rate. So not only is our website platform beautiful, but they generate unmatched results. White glove service is also available if you need it.

related_products.short_desc: Professional, code-free WordPress website builder. Build responsive, pixel-perfect sites using advanced widgets, templates, & features.
related_products.features:
Elementor is a free WordPress website builder for professional web creators that want to build amazing, code-free websites. 

With its advanced features, users can create high performing, responsive sites in a whole new and visual way. 

Our drag & drop interface allows users to design custom-made, pixel-perfect websites. It also works seamlessly with almost any WordPress theme or plugin, so you can continue to use your favorite tools. 

Join 11M+ happy Elementor users worldwide!

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is the leading free website builder for small businesses.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is the leading free website builder for small businesses. Free unlimited pages, hosting, bandwidth, CRM and your own domain included. Used by over 8 million companies worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Tools for the modern professional: proposals, contracts, payments, and more.  Try 7 days free when you're ready.
related_products.features:
HoneyBook helps creative entrepreneurs and freelancers book more clients, manage projects and get paid all in one place. With our business management software, you can automate your busy work and stay on top of all your to-dos, saving time and money so you can grow your business. Its like your own personal assistant.

Small business owners and freelancers have used HoneyBook to increase their bookings and save time.

For your first 6 months, get HoneyBook for $1 per month with code ONLY1.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
related_products.features:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.

related_products.short_desc: Create a professional website quickly and easily, with absolutely no coding knowledge, thanks to Odoo's Website Builder!
related_products.features: With Odoo?s incredibly innovative, user-friendly Website Builder, anyone can create a beautiful website with absolutely no coding knowledge whatsoever. Configure and manage a website quickly and efficiently with Odoo?s simple tools and easy-to-navigate design. Anchors are generated automatically based on the first title within a section, or the snippet name, as applicable. Odoo 14 now offers new snippets: Countdown, Chart, Table of Contents, Product Catalog, and Dynamic Snippets.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile apps for businesses made easy.
related_products.features:
Learn why 1700+ marketing and design agencies are using the Bizness Apps platform to build mobile apps for small business clients. Offer a new, revenue generating service to your SMB clients while staying ahead of the latest trends in mobile technology.

With features like unlimited push notifications, mobile food ordering, reservations, loyalty programs, and coupons our apps directly generate revenue and increase customer engagement.

similar_products.short_desc: With over two million landing pages at an average conversion rate of over 16%, Instapage is helping leading brands across 100 countries
similar_products.features: Instapage is the world's most advanced landing page platform, helping digital advertisers create more relevant and impactful advertising by making it easy to build conversion-optimized landing pages in minutes. With lightning-fast loading speeds, a vast collection of templates, built-in optimization tools, and a dedicated support team, you can scale your online presence like never before. Instapage empowers marketers to maximize conversions by creating, personalizing, and optimizing at scale.

similar_products.short_desc: Web.com offers a simple, easy to use website builder that gives you what you need at a price that is designed to fit your budget.
similar_products.features: With Web.com, you get an easy to use website builder that gives you what you need at a price that is designed to fit your budget. No hidden fees, no advertisements or aggressive sales techniques, just quality tools to help you get started. Whether you're an aspiring small business or just looking to bring your idea to the web for the first time, our drag & drop editing experience makes it simple to create your website and personalize it to meet your specific needs.

similar_products.short_desc: A leading software-as-a-service (SaaS) ecommerce platform that empowers merchants of all sizes to build, innovate, and grow.
similar_products.features: BigCommerce (Nasdaq: BIGC) is a leading software-as-a-service (SaaS) ecommerce platform that empowers merchants of all sizes to build, innovate and grow their businesses online. As a leading open SaaS solution, BigCommerce provides merchants enterprise-grade functionality, customization and performance with simplicity and ease-of-use. Tens of thousands of companies across 150 countries and numerous industries use BigCommerce, including Ben & Jerry's, S.C. Johnson, Skullcandy, Sony and Vodafone.

similar_products.short_desc: Webit is a small-business web solution, offering custom-built websites, dozens of tools and full-service design for just $49 a month.
similar_products.features: Webit is an all-in-one, small-business solution designed to help you grow! As a small business too, we know what it takes to grow, so we offer more for less to help you get ahead. Work with a professional designer to create a beautiful website, sell your products & services, follow-up with customers, manage quotes and invoices, and more - you get it all! Our ever-growing tool suite is just $49/month with no contracts or hidden fees. You shouldn't have to pay more to get what you need to succeed.

similar_products.short_desc: Quickly create a digital library to showcase your content and achieve your goals.
similar_products.features: Tizra makes it easy to build beautiful resource hubs that unleash the power of your content. Generate more revenue, more engagement, and more impact with Tizra's unique combination of search, access management, ecommerce and curation tools. Start simple, and you can be live in a matter of hours. Or go big with a fully integrated enterprise-scale implementation. Either way, Tizra is the platform of choice for organizations that want to squeeze every ounce of value out of their content investment.

similar_products.short_desc: Create a unique online presence with an AI-driven, code-free website builder.
similar_products.features: Get your business online fast and affordably with no experience required. Describe your business and visual preferences to get personalized website templates ready to customize with the easiest drag-and-drop editor.

similar_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is the leading free website builder for small businesses.
similar_products.features: Bitrix24 is the leading free website builder for small businesses. Free unlimited pages, hosting, bandwidth, CRM and your own domain included. Used by over 8 million companies worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Online bookings and guest management system that provides reservation sources tracking, group reservations, calendar with reminders.
similar_products.features: Online bookings and guest management system that provides reservation sources tracking, group reservations, calendar with reminders, and more. Professional Edition includes yield management, point-of-sale, and email marketing capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.

Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure.

similar_products.short_desc: Solodev is the CMS for AWS - empowering designers, marketers, and developers to work together to create amazing customer experiences.
similar_products.features: Solodev DCX is a cloud-first enterprise content management and customer experience platform that lets individuals and teams collaborate on their digital transformation. With Solodev products, users can build amazing websites and applications, share comments, review code, and publish their most ambitious ideas with complete training and 24/7 U.S. support ? all powered by the world?s most secure and scalable cloud infrastructure, Amazon Web Service

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Directory software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Directory tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Directory software is used to create product and services classifieds, informational portals and membership lists with or without monetization options.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Landing Page software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Landing Page tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Landing Page software helps marketers increase conversions and identify the most effective messaging with A/B testing. Most Landing Page software integrates with many of the marketing tools you use everyday, like email automation, CRM, and web analytics. Usually, no coding experience is required to build your own landing pages. Email Marketing software, Lead Management software, Marketing Automation software, Sales Enablement software, and SMS (Text) Marketing software are closely related to Landing Page software.

_source.features_tokenized_text: auto_update data_import/export drag_&_drop landing_pages/web_forms online_store_builder pre-built_templates real_time_editing seo_management

pricing_plans.name: Business
pricing_plans.description: This plan is designed for entrepreneurs that are growing their eCommerce business. There are no contracts and users can upgrade or cancel at any time.

pricing_plans.name: Professional
pricing_plans.description: This plan is designed for users with a digital presence but no online store. There are no contracts and users can upgrade or cancel at any time.
